it.landing-text: Soggiorna in un’antica casa colonica restaurata immersa nelle colline verdi della Toscana.
it.part1-desc: L’appartamento si trova al primo piano di una antica casa colonica completamente ristrutturata, immersa nella campagna toscana tra Firenze e Arezzo. A soli pochi minuti d’auto dall’uscita autostradale Valdarno e a circa 60 km dall’aeroporto di Firenze, è il punto di partenza ideale per esplorare la regione. Saltuariamente i proprietari potrebbero occupare l’altro appartamento del casolare che ha in comune con l’appartamento affittato solo il portone d’accesso e le scale.
it.part2-desc: Avrete a vostra disposizione l’intera proprietà di XX ettari che circonda la casa. E’ possibile passeggiare nell’ampio parco che circonda il casolare, ricco di querce secolari e vegetazione caratteristica della campagna toscana. Potrete facilmente raggiungere anche un torrente lungo il cui corso i contadini che hanno coltivato questo podere fino al secondo dopoguerra hanno realizzarono un piccolo laghetto lungo il corso del fiume che veniva usato per abbeverare gli animali. Si possono avvistare animali selvatici quali caprioli, cerbiatti e numerose specie di uccelli. Potrete pranzare o cenare sotto un loggiato attrezzato con barbecue.
it.2-2p: Presso un maneggio situato a breve distanza.
it.part3-desc: You will have at your disposal the entire property of XX hectares surrounding the house. You can walk in the large park that surrounds the farmhouse, rich in centuries-old oaks and vegetation characteristic of the Tuscan countryside. You can also easily reach a stream along whose course the farmers who cultivated this estate until the Second World War created a small pond along the course of the river that was used to water the animals. You can spot wild animals such as roe deer, fawns and numerous species of birds. You can have lunch or dinner under a porch equipped with a barbecue.
it.3-2p: Con tappe imperdibili come il caratteristico borgo di Loro Ciuffenna e l’antica Pieve romanica di Gropina.
it.3-3p: Ideali per chi cerca pace e contatto con la natura.
it.3-4: La regione è ricca di prodotti tipici della tradizione rurale:
it.3-6p: Nei paesi vicini troverete una varietà di prodotti freschi.
it.3-7p: Dove gustare piatti tipici della cucina toscana.
it.4-33: Cancellazione gratuita se effettuata almeno una settimana prima della data di check-in.

en.landing-text: Stay in an ancient restored farmhouse nestled in the green hills of Tuscany.
en.part1-desc: The apartment is located on the first floor of an ancient farmhouse completely restored, immersed in the Tuscan countryside between Florence and Arezzo. Just a few minutes drive from the Valdarno motorway exit and about 60 km from Florence airport, it is the ideal starting point to explore the region. Occasionally the owners may occupy the other apartment of the farmhouse that has in common with the rented apartment only the entrance door and the stairs.
en.part2-desc: You will have at your disposal the entire property of XX hectares surrounding the house. You can walk in the large park that surrounds the farmhouse, rich in centuries-old oaks and vegetation characteristic of the Tuscan countryside. You can also easily reach a stream along whose course the farmers who cultivated this estate until the Second World War created a small pond along the course of the river that was used to water the animals. You can spot wild animals such as roe deer, fawns and numerous species of birds. You can have lunch or dinner under a porch equipped with a barbecue.
en.2-2p: At a riding stable located a short distance away.
en.part3-desc: You will have at your disposal the entire property of XX hectares surrounding the house. You can walk in the large park that surrounds the farmhouse, rich in centuries-old oaks and vegetation characteristic of the Tuscan countryside. You can also easily reach a stream along whose course the farmers who cultivated this estate until the Second World War created a small pond along the course of the river that was used to water the animals. You can spot wild animals such as roe deer, fawns and numerous species of birds. You can have lunch or dinner under a porch equipped with a barbecue.
en.3-2p: With unmissable stops such as the characteristic village of Loro Ciuffenna and the ancient Romanesque Pieve of Gropina.
en.3-3p: Ideal for those looking for peace and contact with nature.
en.3-4: The region is rich in typical products of the rural tradition:
en.3-6p: In the nearby villages you will find a variety of fresh products.
en.3-7p: Where to taste typical Tuscan dishes.
en.4-33: Free cancellation if made at least one week before the check-in date.
